description: Batch Range Configuration for Petty Cash Sorter
instructions: Fill in the 'batch_range' for each sheet where you want to use batch updates
Leave 'batch_range' as null to use individual cell updates
The range should cover all cells that might be updated by petty cash transactions

(A) CANNABIS DIST..description: Target sheet for petty cash transactions

(B) CANNABIS DIST..description: Target sheet for petty cash transactions
